doc.field: Lt. Carlson case (Manson assisted in defense against Antisemitism charges. Socialist songbooks. Records of trip to Turkey (1960s). Turkish government contract. Labor arbitration cases including United Auto Workers, Federal Employees Metal Trades Council. Diego Rivera postcard set. Pamphlets. Non-print items include: pin, I.D. tags, audiotapes on seminars, meetings.
